channel.title: My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Verbs with prepositions
item.description: (sich) erinnern an + Dativ = remember about somth Example: Ich erinnere an dir Lust haven auf + Akkusativ = feel like Example: Ich habe Lust auf einen Hamburger. Meaning: I feel like a hamburger

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Hello! This is my blog for learning german. I’ll post my posts there, using grammatical rules.
